entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
